I am a PhD student in Economics at the [Bordeaux School of Economics](https://www.bse.u-bordeaux.fr/) (University of Bordeaux).

I work under the supervision of [Olivier Bargain](https://sites.google.com/site/bargainoliv/) and [Isabelle Chort](https://sites.google.com/site/isabellechort/).
